member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.AllNoiseQueryException
member.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when a search query's terms are all noise words.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.CollapsingStatus
member.summary: Defines whether duplicate results are collapsed for Search queries results.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.CollapsingStatus.DuplicatesCollapsed
member.summary: Specifies that duplicate items in search results are collapsed, meaning that they are grouped together and only the most relevant item is returned in the search results set.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.FullTextSqlQuery
member.summary: Represents a search query using the SearchSQL Syntax.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.FullTextSqlQuery.#ctor(Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, based on the specified site.
member.param: A object representing the context for the Shared Services Provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.FullTextSqlQuery.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, based on the specified application name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.InvalidPropertyException
member.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when the search query contains a property that is not valid.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.InvalidPropertyException.Property
member.summary: Gets the property name that triggered the exception.
member.returns: A string containing the property name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.InvalidPropertyException.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.KeywordInclusion
member.summary: Defines the keyword inclusion values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.KeywordInclusion.AllKeywords
member.summary: Indicates that the query returns only the search results that contain all of the query terms.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.KeywordInclusion.AnyKeyword
member.summary: Indicates that the query returns search results that contain any of the query terms.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.KeywordInformation
member.summary: Contains information about a keyword.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.KeywordInformation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.KeywordInformation.Definition
member.summary: Gets or sets the keyword's definition.
member.returns: A string containing the definition text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.KeywordInformation.Keyword
member.summary: Gets or sets the keyword term.
member.returns: A string containing the keyword term.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyConstraintCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of objects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyConstraintCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of objects in the collection.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer representing the number of property constraints in the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyConstraintCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the crawl rule collection.
member.returns: A System.Collections.IEnumerator object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyConstraintCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the property constraint at the specified index in the collection.
member.returns: A object.
member.param: A 32-bit integer that specifies the position in the index.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyInformation
member.summary: Provides information about a managed property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyInformation.Description
member.summary: Gets the property description.
member.returns: A string containing the description.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyInformation.FullTextQueriable
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the property can be used in full-text SQL syntax queries.
member.returns: true if the property can be used in SQL syntax queries; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyInformation.Name
member.summary: Gets the property name.
member.returns: A string containing the name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyInformation.Retrievable
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the property value can be retrieved.
member.returns: true if the property can be retrieved; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.PropertyInformation.Type
member.summary: Gets the property data type.
member.returns: An object of type System.Type representing the managed property type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query
member.summary: Provides the base class for executing search queries using the Search query object model. This class defines properties and methods that are shared by the and classes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.Application
member.summary: Gets the application name for the query request.
member.returns: A string that contains the application name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.AuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication type for the query.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets the locale for the query.
member.returns: A System.Globalization.CultureInfo object that specifies the locale ID.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.EnableStemming
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether stemming is enabled.
member.returns: true if the stemming is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.Execute
member.summary: Executes the search query.
member.returns: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.HighlightedSentenceCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of sentences to include in the hit-highlighted summary.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer representing the number of sentences. The default value is 3.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.Hint
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies xxx
member.returns: A value from the enumeration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.IgnoreAllNoiseQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the search query should execute if the query text contains only noise words.
member.returns: true if search queries containing only noise words are executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.KeywordInclusion
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the query returns results that contain all or any of the specified search terms.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.QueryText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text for the search query.
member.returns: A string containing the query text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.ResultTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the search result type.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.RowLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows to be retrieved in the search results.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer that represents the maximum number of rows to be retrieved in the results of a search.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.SiteContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the site URL for the search query.
member.returns: A System.Uri object that represents the site's URL.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.StartRow
member.summary: Gets or sets the first row of information from the search results.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer that represents the index number of the row. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, before the query request times out.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer representing the number of milliseconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.TrimDuplicates
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether duplicate items should be removed from the search results.
member.returns: true if duplicate items are removed from the search results; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Query.UrlZone
member.summary: Gets the originating URL zone for the query request.
member.returns: A value from the Microsoft.SharePoint.Administration.SPUrlZone enumeration specifying the URL zone.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.QueryAuthenticationType
member.summary: Defines the query authentication types supported in Search.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.QueryAuthenticationType.NtAuthenticatedQuery
member.summary: Specifies that the query uses Windows authentication.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.QueryAuthenticationType.PluggableAuthenticatedQuery
member.summary: Specifies that the query uses pluggable authentication.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.QueryContainsOnlyExcludedTermsException
member.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when the search query contains only excluded terms.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.QueryMalformedException
member.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when a search query is not formed correctly.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable
member.summary: Provides a means of reading query search results through the interface. Each row of the represents one search result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable.FieldCount
member.summary: Gets the number of columns returned in the search results.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer representing the number of fields.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable.GetString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the string value of the field at the specified ordinal index.
member.returns: The string value of the specified field.
member.param: The ordinal index of the string value to get.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable.IsClosed
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if the ResultTable is closed.
member.returns: true if the ResultTable is closed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a search result from the collection, based on the specified index.
member.param: A 32-bit integer specifying the row index.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a search result from the collection, based on the name of the row to return.
member.param: A string containing the name of the individual result row to return.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable.Read
member.summary: Advances the to the next record.
member.returns: true if there are more rows; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTable.RowCount
member.summary: Gets the number of query results contained in the object.
member.returns: The number of query results contained in the object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of objects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of objects in the collection.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer indicating the number of objects in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.DatabaseTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of query execution on the database server.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer indicating how long the query ran, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.Definition
member.summary: Gets the structures for the results of the query.
member.returns: An array of structures whose fields provide details on the query's keyword definitions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.ElapsedTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the total duration of the query, combining the time spent executing the query on the database server with the time spent in the object model.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer indicating how long the query ran, in milliseconds.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.Exists(Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultType)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified ResultTable object exists in the collection.
member.returns: true if the specified ResultTable object exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the ResultTable collection.
member.returns: A System.Collections.IEnumerator object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.IgnoredNoiseWords
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of ignored noise words.
member.returns: A string array containing the ignored noise words.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.Item(Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultType)
member.summary: Gets a object from the collection, based on the result type.
member.returns: A object containing only the requested result types.
member.param: A value from the enumeration indicating the type of query results to get.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.KeywordInformation
member.summary: Gets a object that provides information about a matched special term and its definition for a keyword search.
member.returns: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.QueryTerms
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of the search terms used by the query.
member.returns: A string array containing the search query terms.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultTableCollection.SpellingSuggestion
member.summary: Gets or sets an alternate spelling for a search term that is not recognized.
member.returns: A string containing the suggested term.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultType
member.summary: Defines the result types for Search results.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultType.None
member.summary: No result type is specified.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ResultType.RelevantResults
member.summary: Specifies the results set that contains the main search results from the content index that matches the search query.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.ScopeNotFoundException
member.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when the scope name specified for a search query does not exist.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SearchQueryException
member.summary: Provides the base class for Search query exceptions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SearchServiceNotFoundException
member.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when the search service is unavailable.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Sort
member.summary: Defines how the search results are sorted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Sort.Direction
member.summary: Gets the direction in which the search results are ordered.
member.returns: A value from the enumeration specifying the sort direction for search results.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.Sort.Property
member.summary: Gets the name for a property by which the search results are ordered.
member.returns: A string containing the property name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of structures.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortCollection.Add(System.String,Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortDirection)
member.summary: Adds a new structure to the collection.
member.param: A string that specifies the name of the property to sort the results by.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortCollection.Clear
member.summary: Removes all structures from the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of structures in the collection.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer representing the number of Sort structures.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the crawl rule collection.
member.returns: A System.Collections.IEnumerator object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified Sort structure from the collection.
member.param: A 32-bit integer that specifies the index position.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortDirection
member.summary: Defines the sort direction values for ordering search results.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortDirection.Ascending
member.summary: Specifies that the search results are ordered in ascending order.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Search.Query.SortDirection.Descending
member.summary: Specifies that the search results are ordered in descending order.
